name: Territory.IO - online version of Paper Splix Games
name_original: Territory.IO - online version of Paper Splix Games
description:
Territory.it is a fun online multiplayer game where you compete against other players all around the world.

Try to capture as many blocks as possible and become the number one on the leaderboard.

In Territory.it your objective is to capture as many blocks as possible, draw a line around an area and get back to your own land in order to capture the area. But watch out, because if anyone touches your line before you reach your own land, you die.
